column2: <Sighs> Ain't nobody got one darned piece of news about my boy? Not one lousy speck of information?
Better be a good reason. I didn't join up with you to go on nature walks.
Well, what do we have here, huh? Let me guess. You've heard about the mistress who makes all your fantasies come true.
I don't wanna fucking hear it. You've lost the trust of the family. Goodbye, I hope Hell isn't too hot for you.
Things are good since Cachino took over.
Who the hell are you? Better yet, what the hell are you doing in this cursed place?
Come out and face your death!
Death to the Legion's enemies!
Oh, you're charming in your own way, I suppose. Not budging on the price for those parts, though.
When House gave us the Tops to renovate, his robots dropped off boxes full of suits and ties and wingtip shoes. Told us we were the "Chairmen" now.
Sorry, but blackening our reputation with our biggest client isn't worth the risk.
Okay. This will just take a moment.
They say it's safer to travel now that Fiends are retreating, but I'd still look out for trouble.
People fight and die for what they believe in. I'm just here to patch them up so they can go on their merry way. Do no harm and all that.
Aw, you really know how to make a girl feel like a stray cat.
Aha!
I've seen what those creatures do, and I don't know how you trust them.
Drop it. Now why the hell are you here?
Our victory at Nelson's a worthy story to tell in my travels.
Thought as much. Nothing there after all.
They know stuff about tech and medicine and usually help out anybody who asks. Can't say I know any more than that.
I... I don't know what I want. But I hate this place, and I hate these people.
Guess we have that in common, then.
You're cleared to go on through.
Really? I never thought I'd see the day.
They have a fantastic menu at the diner.
No!
The Lucky 38, all lit up in the distance? It's an inviting target.
Name's Regis - I'm Papa Khan's advisor and right-hand man. I'm also the chief enforcer of the tribe's laws - so watch your behavior.
They say the Fiends are defeated, but I'm sticking close to the army - just in case.
Friendly warning, you might want to steer clear of NCR facilities. You're not exactly popular.
Was a time I would've agreed with you. But this... it's too big, it affects too many people. I can't get hung up on those details.
Here's your chip. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Yeah, I could've ended buried in the sands with just my head sticking out. Ants love that - a riot, know what I mean?
Novac: Vilified.
Well, keep at it.
I hear a troublesome Legion camp got razed to the ground!
Hey, welcome to Red Rock Canyon! Since you've done so much for the Great Khans, Papa Khan told me to let you know you can buy weapons at our Armory.
I hope that satisfies your curiosity about me, because I won't waste any more of Caesar's time talking about myself.
She flashed it around, all over town,
Mr. House has everything to do with Vault 21. He tried to get us out before he filled it with concrete.
Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Just, don't do anything crazy.
You'll pay for what you did to our soldiers at Forlorn Hope, murderer!
It was m-my fault. See... I was kn-knocked out when it happened. That b-big guy sneaked up on us. I let B-Betsy down.
I've seen what those creatures do, and I don't know how you trust them.
Most patients don't get out of bed after being shot and then move like they was in perfect control. You're unusual, I'll say that.
I met Carla while I was at the Strip on leave. She said I looked lost.
Hey, you're the one that's been hunting the most dangerous beasts for The Thorn!
Great, just when you think the NCR can't possibly sink their claws deeper, the town of Primm signs up to join the Republic.
How can I help you?
You're the boss.
Word is you're getting popular in The Strip.
I knew those Khans couldn't be trusted!
Third-place runners-up got enslaved. I got the fuck beat out of my legs, and the winner they let go free.
Artillery of this sort has a range of several miles. If it's going to fire on Hoover Dam, I want it firing at my targets.
Holy shit! Run for your lives!
The owner of the Vault was murdered. I thought we were safe inside the Strip.
Murderer!
What the fuck are you doing? My brother died at the Battle of Hoover Dam. You're desecrating a war memorial.
Okay, I won't!
War doesn't forgive anybody, but what did we do to deserve this?
What happened?
I know sometimes I sound like I don't. I know. But there's something that still rings true to me about our code.
What's your reputation with Primm?
You and I have got nothing to talk about.
Our victory at Nelson's a worthy story to tell in my travels.
Those Legion elite troops are bad blood.
The fountain is for wishes, ladies.
Give me a shout if you need anything else.
Damn!
Bitter Springs... a name like that could've only brought bad luck.
Now it's the Wrights and Van Graffs. Seems like things never get better. Anyway, that's all behind me now.
Red Lucy was a fine warrior, and a beautiful woman.
The only thing down there is a swim of several hundred feet against the current. You'd drown for sure.
Civilizing Primm will show what we can do for everyone else in these territories.
You shouldn't be here. If people know we talked, they'll suspect you.
Those Legion elite troops are bad blood.
Here I was thinking you'd be a challenge, want a rematch?
I see - you're in a predicament.
Your merchant friend would make a fine NCR woman.
I hear we straightened up a band of thugs in Freeside.
The Fiends are running for their lives. That'll show everyone what we do to our enemies.
Excessive use causes dilated eyes, an increased heart rate and blood pressure, massive sweating, you know... the usual.
Very well. Will there be anything else?
I'll send Major Polatli word about the situation here.
We need more firepower!
I live to serve Caesar's will - and the will of the Legion. If my victory serves them both, then I am pleased.
This is our turf. Don't even try to snoop around or I'll fucking kill your right here, right now.
We'll die out.
Those Khans got the hint! We've shown everyone that these are our new territories.
I hear the Great Khans are pretty tough, I hope we can join them.
You'd be crazy to put your money on either side of the coming battle.
Are you okay?
Our forces suffered a huge blow at Forlorn Hope, We'll remember that!
I don't want any trouble, okay?
Caesar is not fond of loose cannons like yourself. I sincerely hope you change your ways before something drastic must occur.
The salvage business has really slowed down since those ghouls took over REPCONN.
Oof!
Grrrraah!
What now?
Here's your chip. Is there anything else I can help you with?
I get it, you're sore. A crumb's life is painful. But soon you won't feel a thing. Ta-ta.
Hey, that's mine!
The big showdown between the NCR and the Legion is coming soon, believe you me.
What have you done?
Those Legion elite troops are bad blood.
Look, I've got people to care for. I'm not looking for trouble.
Whatever. I've got better things to do.
I guess those "Kings" finally got who's the real boss around here.
I don't trust those creeps at the Ultra-Luxe.
I knew those Khans couldn't be trusted!
Nice work at the Tops buddy.
Really?  Huh, never thought of that.  The Crimson Caravan isn't really in the drug business.
Uhh, hey. Welcome to Red Rock Canyon. You've seemed a little bipolar lately - maybe you're having withdrawal symptoms?
If the NCR wasn't spread so thin, maybe we could actually get some supplies and reinforcements around here.
Yeah, he used to come around here a lot. Haven't seen him in a while, though. Why?
I see. Then the Great Khans will fight for the Legion should Caesar give the call. If you change your mind, let me know.
Was there something else?
Khans are history, it serves them right!
NCR... did you just crawl out from under a rock? Those folks only care about their business, their people and their pockets.
Sources at the Dam are telling us that the involvement of one key person appears to have heavily influenced the outcome.
Are you trying to get my saloon shot up? Finish what you started!
Hey!
They pick you out if you do well at the firing range. Pays a little better, so I said okay.
Damn it!
The territories are safer now that the Khans have disappeared.
And why would you have done that?
Both Gundersons, gone? I'll be damned, you are one of a kind!
Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Very well. Will there be anything else?
Things are getting stranger every day.
Bye.
Our victory at Nelson's a worthy story to tell in my travels.
His destination is hardly a mystery. It's a near certainty that he's making his way for Caesar's camp, at Fortification Hill.
You can't hide from me.
What in Creation is the matter with you? Ain't you ever been a parent? Ain't you ever been worried you lost someone?
You pushed me too far!
I'm kind of busy, what do you want?
It's a shame about President Kimball, he was a good man.
Aha!
This slaughter pleases me. No act is more sacred than consecrating a site in the blood of one's enemies.
Better not try that again.
Flank 'em!
I've got a shipment of Jet and Psycho that needs to be delivered to Motor Runner at Vault 3.
Civilizing Primm will show what we can do for everyone else in these territories.
You can't hide from Leo!
I don't trust those creeps at the Ultra-Luxe.
I should kill you myself for what you did to Kimball, and fuck the law!
Here you go. Put it to good use.
Rex will be tougher.
I hear we straightened up a band of thugs in Freeside.
Why not let the robot deal with it?
I'm guessing you don't really know how this business works, kid. My offer is very generous already. Think about it.
Huh?
Our victory at Nelson's a worthy story to tell in my travels.
With House out of the way, I hope someone opens the Lucky 38.
They say the Fiends are defeated, but I'm sticking close to the army - just in case.
They say the Fiends are defeated, but I'm sticking close to the army - just in case.
So fucked up I can't feel my legs.
Come on, boss, I know I'm ugly, but I am on your side.
Very much appreciated. These caps will go towards funding schools and other services to the poorer part of the community.
An assassin attacked the president in full view of the crowd, but was not apprehended. Witness descriptions of the killer differ wildly.
Our rangers are going to show everyone what happens when we're pissed off!
Very well. Please stand back - I don't want any erroneous readings. You're welcome to stay and observe if you want, though.
Caesar's Legion: Wild Child.
For crying out loud. Get out of my face then.
Now that don't make a lick of sense. Seems to me you're the luckiest son-of-a-gun in New Vegas.
Don't kill anybody if you don't have to. I'm a scout, and I like to keep a low profile.
Grenade!
Those last five shots were a bad idea...
Hmm. Sometimes when you give tests like this, you learn more than you was hoping for, and I reckon that ain't always the best thing.
Tread lightly, fool. You are entering Caesar's land.
Vault 3's Fiend territory. Those shit-heads attack Westside all the time, even making it to the rest of Outer Vegas when they crawl under the sewers.
Just like you said five minutes ago. Don't worry, boss, I got it.
Let's see you handle this!
That's... an unfortunate mistake.
The time to assert our rule over the territories has come.
Legionaries are next in the list of rabid dogs to put down!
Just off the turbine room down below are three power regulators. It's a redundant system - only one is needed.
Because of a promise. One I haven't been able to keep. The Nightkin all suffer from schizophrenia. It's the Stealth Boys they use, used to use.
Another satisfied customer.
Leave me alone!
You bastard!
Why do they call it a monorail... it's a train. A *train.*
You truly are something else! Those Omertas looked like they were going to kill Carlitos on the spot.
I'm the person who will pay you when you complete the delivery contract you signed. Now go get the Chip.
If the Legion can reach as far as Bitter Springs, what's going to stop them from getting to us?
Uh, sure. I'll just be going then.
Grrrraah!
What in Maxson's name?
Company readiness reports are logged on the computer systems at the Resort. If you hack the system, you could alter our records.
We'll remain until the camp is packed up. If you have some plan, see to it quickly.
Look out!
You're new here aren't you? Don't tell me we're actually going to get reinforcements.
If you cover the area methodically, I'm quite certain you'll happen upon them with only the most insubstantial of delays.
Who's got a target?
I don't have time to talk. There's lots of work to be done here.
I guess those "Kings" finally got who's the real boss around here.
I don't really like to go to bed until it gets dark out.
Here, this is the key to their collars. You'll want to take those off before you go far, trust me.
They dragged us and everybody else into the center of town. And that asshole with a dog on his head, he starts talking about how we're bad people!
So you're the one that saved President Kimball. Damn glad to have you on our side.
You're always welcome among the Followers, friend.
Had enough?
Quartermaster Mayes was yelling at us about rationing again. Where does the guy get the energy to yell so much while on rations?
Want to dance, hit Gomorrah.
Grenade!
So anyway, how about those hostages?
I heard Chief Hanlon is dead. How are we going to fight the Legion without him?
People have been counterfeiting bottle caps forever, but it's always been small scale.
See, that wasn't so bad. Anything else I can do for you?
That was a good day for The Thorn.
I hear the Khans won't trouble us anymore.
Good to see you, amicus.
It was a matter of time before someone got to Mr. House.
Khans are history, it serves them right!
The territories are safer now that the Khans have disappeared.
People are whispering, everywhere, about the massive Legion army gathering past the Colorado.
You think me a fool? We wouldn't hire an outsider to deal with a traitor.
I've seen what those creatures do, and I don't know how you trust them.
Once you're ready, meet me outside on the observation deck, but don't take too long.
So what if I did? What are you going to do about it?
Primm: Rascal.
Beat it, or I'll call the bots on you right quick.
The territories are safer now that the Khans have disappeared.
They say it's safer to travel now that Fiends are retreating, but I'd still look out for trouble.
I'll surrender on one condition - you protect Westside's secret. Without that water, this community won't survive long.
We hope to forge a brave new world free of war and poverty by sharing knowledge and resources. Our primary goal is the free exchange of ideas.
Okay. Um... do you think you could help me?
Holy shit!
Good to see you again!
And that's the news.
How did the Legion make it into the power plant?
Same stuff. Any NCR weapons, computer parts, or radio parts.
Things are getting stranger every day.
Okay, listen here. Unless we can get some additional support, I'm going to need you to help me resolve this situation.
Did you hear about the Legion Defeat at Nelson? We're winning back our territories.
Hope those Fiends give us no trouble.
This is The Thorn! Here's where the strong make a name for themselves and the weak are fed to the jaws of hell.
You here to help, or just dick around all day?
That was a good day for The Thorn.
I'll believe that the Fiends are gone when they stop their raiding and pillaging.
Steeling our pure-breed resolve, that's how! We've faced the Wasteland right in the old mug and told her to shove it!
Nah, I gave it up years ago. Too dangerous. And even if I did still collect them, I'd tell you the same.
Why don't you just come out where I can see you?
Hey!
Huh. Maybe Father Elijah had the right idea.
Hot damn do I love this place.
Okay, carry on. And, we've never been here, you understand? Boss doesn't need to know about this.
We Followers aren't pushovers!
Let's go. We're wasting our time.
Good. Hey, I got another job for you if you're interested.
Well, you'll probably be fine. For a little while, anyway.
Holy shit!
Also, if you're any good at covert ops, I would love to get a bug planted on their radio. So far, we've been unable to crack their encryption.
And you didn't even get skinned alive. I'm impressed. Here's your payment.
Sure thing.
It can't be! How the hell...
You will be avenged, Brother.
I've heard that elite units are on the way to support our armies here.
I don't have any supplies to spare, but I've got caps if you have anything you don't need.
I hear we straightened up a band of thugs in Freeside.
I've heard about you.
Yeah, right. Dick.
What the fuck was that? I've seen crippled slaves move faster.
I've heard the Legion's planning to unleash their best men against us.
Oooh, those Nightstalkers, always killing my Bighorners! It'll be nice to give them a piece of my mind!
I dunno, I just love it here. What the fuck do you think, asshole?
I'd wager that the army's sending elite units our way, right as we speak.
I do not question Caesar's will! I do not second-guess!
To what purpose? It's highly unlikely you'd understand anything I'd say.
What the hell do you want?
You tracked me across the desert, Sugar Plum. Finding the Presidential? Easy pickings.
That Fiend leader got what he fucking deserved.
Our forces suffered a huge blow at Forlorn Hope, We'll remember that!
You, uhh, you want to point that someplace else, boss? I got enough holes in me.
VStoryEventCampGolf set to 3.
Grenade!
I hear a troublesome Legion camp got razed to the ground!
Just about my whole life, ever since my daddy left ma and me and went off to roam the wastes.
I hear a troublesome Legion camp got razed to the ground!
I know that, dearie.
Our own President, murdered! Things aren't looking good.
This is exactly the kind of thing I was looking for. Thank you.
I was young and I needed the money.
That's not a good idea.
Everyone is either starving or dying out here. Left out to dry by the rest of the NCR. Fuck this place.
I know he's dead. I know he's no longer a factor. That's all I need to know.
There you are! Were you trying to hide from me?
Zone clear! Advance to the next position.
Should've bet we'd kill the Fiend's leader.
I'll believe that the Fiends are gone when they stop their raiding and pillaging.
Cut it out, will you?
O'Hanrahan's a big pussy, ain't good for shit in a fight, and Mags... well, Mags is cut out for something other than soldiering, you dig?
Where'd she go?
All right. I'll let it go - this time.
I told everyone we shouldn't have bet for the Khans.
You're a model citizen, thank you.
This hall leads to our guest rooms. You can use the first room on our left. But no snooping next door! That's my room, always was.
Is your friend one of those elite troops we've been hearing about?
I've heard the Legion's planning to unleash their best men against us.
Kimball's entire political career is inextricably bound up with the NCR's occupation of the Mojave. It's his war.
Hey!
Shut up and keep going.
That Fiend leader shouldn't have messed with our great army.
No.
What the fuck are you looking at?
What was that for?
Oh! Well, I heard... I mean, we heard... we meaning the Followers of the Apocalypse... that you had been in there. The Lucky 38, I mean.
Eesh, is my act that bad, or are you just that dumb? Yeah, that's right - got me a nice, juicy contract with the management.
With Mr. House dead and gone, Vegas can finally join the NCR!
About the shortage of Hydra right? We all have our own ways to deal with this place. Me, I sometimes walk at night. Calms the nerves.
VStoryEvenFiends set to 0.
Let's see you handle this!
It's time for blood, not talk. Find me after the fight.
Why's everything spinning?
Thanks, but if Bishop finds me and I don't have his money, my balls are going to be on his trophy wall.
Hence, Benny was captured or killed - possibly by you, but by my estimates, far more probably by Caesar's Legion. Hence, Caesar gave you the Chip.
This deserves a good compensation, kid. How does that sound?
Thanks.
I always knew House would give in! Sixth state of the union, here we come!
How the hell did the monorail blow up? Someone's bringing back luck into the Strip, I tell you.
Excellent. Killing the Legion commanders in Nelson will severely cripple the Legion forces and allow us to take back the city.
What, we leaving *already?*
Right on, let's have it!
I've never seen a robot like that before.
I'm impressed to say the least, and that's no easy thing. You've secured NCR's future - the administration sends its thanks, for what it's worth.
You know what? I don't need this bullshit right now. We'll take off that goddamn power armor, if it'll just shut you up.
What's a mutant doing in the Strip?
That Fiend leader shouldn't have messed with our great army.
Our victory at Nelson's a worthy story to tell in my travels.
Have you considered that he might be senile?
Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
They held out as long as they could. Lost most of their force before they retreated. Gave us a little parting gift, too.
Sure.
NCR sources say that holding the Dam against Caesar's Legion has become their main strategic priority, and this move would not be unexpected.
You better watch yourself around here.
Vault 3's Fiend territory. Those shit-heads attack Westside all the time, even making it to the rest of Outer Vegas when they crawl under the sewers.
Look, I ain't a harbor for illusions. I ain't expecting to get out of this shin-dig alive.
Here's your chips. Is there anything else I can help you with?
I watch over the Bighorners. They're sweet, gentle creatures, but sometimes they get ornery. Just like my grandkids!
Your robot looks worth quite a few caps.
Go find a minefield and practice that "trick" several times, then. Idiot.
I'm willing to bet that wherever they're hiding, there's a working reactor powering their equipment. That's their vulnerability.
The territories are safer now that the Khans have disappeared.
Our rangers are going to show everyone what happens when we're pissed off!
Nobody messes with the Kings.
Hey!
Where are you?
Now you're talking! That is the ring-a-ding move, baby.
I've spent too many years waiting for this moment to see it fumbled by an insubordinate contractor.
What the hell are you doing here? Civilians shouldn't be here.
Things are good since Cachino took over.
I've heard that elite units are on the way to support our armies here.
You should be listening, that's what you should be doing.
Could use a hundred of you, just scatter you over the East like jacks, give those plumed fucks the what-for.
Have a seat in the Auto-Doc. This will take a few hours.
Thanks for your support. I'll make sure that the NCR Emergency radio is up and running. Go kill those bastards.
Going to place me a good bet at The Thorn.
No need to be rude, pal. Just trying to bring the joy of entertainment into your life!
Hey, who says I can't fix that? You bring me those boom-suits too, okay?
The territories are safer now that the Khans have disappeared.
Things are good since Cachino took over.
These days, I spend most of my time trying to beat a little discipline into the soldiers under my command. They've gotten soft with no action.
If the Legion can reach as far as Bitter Springs, what's going to stop them from getting to us?
Mr. House finally wised up and said he'd join the NCR in a year or something like that. Good news all around.
Awaiting a delivery, but it's a no-show. I'm guessing that the Deathclaws in the quarry have something to do with that.
Picked the wrong time for hide and seek.
It's a fitting revenge for Searchlight. Thanks for taking care of those bastards for us.
Harder than you think. I don't want you blowing us both up, so I'll just hold on to this.
Hey!
The Legion will swell with the number of slaves we will claim from this place, and the tribute we gather will fund further campaigns.
The Kings were pushing it too far, and they got what was coming to them.
I'd wager that the army's sending elite units our way, right as we speak.
I really hope that incident at REPCONN doesn't drive people away. Novac was starting to do well!
Okay! How can I help you?
Can you handle this?
In fact, there's more hope in wrangling Brahmin with my grandmother's stocking than inspiring these troopers.
Okay, I won't bother.
Gone to their reward.
Kimball dead, maybe the NCR will learn to stay the fuck out of other people's business.
The President is scheduled to arrive sometime in the afternoon. It's going to be a short visit to boost morale for the NCR troops.
Amazingly, they've still managed to outwit a half-blind arthritic ghoul.
With two contubernia at my command, I've killed and captured four times my numbers.
Caesar's fate was sealed from the start.
Hot damn do I love this place.
I see that now. I thought I knew him better than that. But it was like talking to a stranger.
Are you okay?
Word out of Camp Golf is that many NCR Rangers can expect redeployment in the near future. One anonymous soldier said it was part of a new strategy.
Yeah.
Kids. Run by sh- shumtimes.
I bet this'll hurt!
With Caesar dead, I'm afraid for the women. The Legate is a brutal man, and he enjoys inflicting pain.
Look alive, guys, you're on NCR time.
I've heard that we're getting strong reinforcements to help us civilize the territories.
The Legion better watch out now, our Rangers are going to turn the tables around!
They killed him!
You better control thatthing. Bots can't be trusted.
I really appreciate those books. They've already been a huge help.
Won't have to worry about those Fiend assholes for some time now, huh?
Which faction?
Dammit, I thought I had you there. Let's play again.
You want to hear the story of the Great Khans? It's a long one, full of honor, glory and betrayal. We have suffered, but we will regain our glory.
I knew that the Khans were animals. We should kill them like vermin.
Jackpot, baby! I knew we'd see eye to eye!
It seems that the territories are about to blow up.
I don't know, unfortunately. There may be clues somewhere inside the camp, but I'm not about to run in there to find out.
Caesar's dead. Bet he didn't see this coming when he was having his coffee this morning.
This won't hurt a bit. Nah, just kidding. It will probably hurt a lot. Hold still.
I sat down at a roulette table with my life savings. An hour later, it was gone.
What the hell happened with these readiness reports? These scores are way too high!
I don't want to be seen with the likes of you. Get lost.
The robots collect House's share of the take every week and life goes on. Ain't exactly what I'd call leadership.
This is it. War's almost upon us.
As you wish, chieftain.
I heard some Squatters talking about some fancy pants Rangers coming into the area soon. Like we need more NCR here.
Grrrraah!
On how many can you take, stranger?
At least this way the badasses with the top-shelf guns are on my side.
The territories are safer now that the Khans have disappeared.
Okay.
You hear about this courier doing shit around the Strip? Like what, delivering mail?
Nelson will serve as example. We'll bleed the ground red with anyone who opposes our peace-efforts.
The other thing I heard is that he wasn't really commanding the army anymore. Guess we made sure of that.
Confident, I like that.
Do I look like a seamstress to you? Those boomsters can stay in their nowhereville until the sun runs out of gas, for all I care. No deal.
Silliest dressed band of raping, slaving marauders you'll see east of California, I'll say that. Where's that touch of Old World class?
Aha!
If I transplant this brain into Rex, he'll be a bit more ferocious in his attacks.
You can't hide from me.
I'd wager that the army's sending elite units our way, right as we speak.
They killed him!
This program was brought to you by Gomorrah. Gomorrah. It'll be our secret.
Everything was great until McLafferty came along. That old bitch is gonna hear about it from my dad, just you wait.
And what benefit would this alliance give us?
Hello! It was you, set the Khans free down in Boulder City? You did that? Oh shit.
Don't you know who I work for?
It's quiet out here. We like to keep it that way.
Flank 'em!
Our victory at Nelson's a worthy story to tell in my travels.
I hope you're doing well, friend!
Later.
Esteban's going home now. I can't tell you what that means to me.
Grenade!
A reliable source told me we're getting the best NCR soldiers to help us against the Legion.
This job's boring enough without talking to you. Go see Alexander.
We Followers aren't pushovers!
One of these days, Red Lucy's going to show off her Deathclaws.
Our rangers are going to show everyone what happens when we're pissed off!
One day I'll get to see Deathclaws tear through Fiends!
It seems that the territories are about to blow up.
If I don't get more water soon, I won't make my quota this season.
Nope. The NCR's been trying to switch over to using paper money, like in the Pre-War days. Trouble is that the exchange rates ain't exactly fair.
What's a mutant doing in the Strip?
Nero's the pack leader and Big Sal's his right hand. What Nero wants, Big Sal does. Then there's... Cachino.
